Drug discovery en 5 Enfermedades Pediátricas Raras que pueden afectar a tus hijos:

 Fibrosis Quística

 Distrofia Muscular de Duchenne

 Enfermedad de Gaucher

 Enfermedad de Niemann Pick Tipo C

 Osteogenesis Imperfecta




Estas enfermedades afectan a más de 1 millón de niños en todo el mundo.


Utilizamos medicinas ya conocidas; desarrollo rápido, seguro, económico y de menor riesgo.


SOM Biotech se compromete a llevar cualquier resultado positivo hasta su comercialización.







Las enfermedades raras, también conocidas como enfermedades huérfanas, son enfermedades que afectan una pequeña proporción de la población mundial (alrededor del 6-8%). De acuerdo con la Organización Nacional de Enfermedades Raras (NORD) existen alrededor de 7.000 enfermedades raras en todo el mundo, la mayoría de las cuales sin cura ni tratamiento significativo disponible. La motivación para investigar estas enfermedades ha sido desatendida, en gran medida, debido a la pequeña población afectada, además de la falta de conocimiento y el bajo potencial de rendimiento de las inversiones.




El 50% de enfermedades raras afectan a niños en todo el mundo, siendo las  pediátricas las formas más complejas de enfermedades raras. Además, muchos de los tratamientos para estas enfermedades no son aplicables a la población pediátrica. Algunas de las enfermedades raras pediátricas más graves incluyen:
1. Fibrosis Quística - Info

Producción anormal de fluidos espesos que llevan a obstrucciones y complicaciones de los sistemas respiratorio y digestivo.

Aproximadamente 70,000 - 100,000 personas afectadas en todo el mundo.
Más del 95% de los hombres son estériles.
DA pesar de los cuidados, los pacientes tienen una esperanza de vida reducida en comparación con la población en general (≈35 años).
 Mutación Génica: CFTR (Herencia Autosómica Recesiva).




2. Distrofia Muscular de Duchenne - Info
Degeneración muscular progresiva y debilidad causando problemas de movilidad, respiratorios y de desarollo esquelético.

Aproximadamente 300,000 personas afectadas en todo el mundo.
Afectación mayoritaria en hombres, raramente en mujeres.
Estimación de 1/3,500 hombres nacidos afectados en todo el mundo.
Aproximadamente 20,000 nuevos casos/año.
Inmovilidad habitual sobre los 12 años de edad.
Esperanza de vida estimada: 25 años, raramente > 30 años
 Mutación Génica: Distrofina (Herencia Autosómica Recesiva).





3. Enfermedad de Gaucher (3 tipos) - Info
Acumulación de sustancias grasas, incluyendo glucocerebrósidos y glucoesfingolípidos, dentro de las células, dando lugar a complicaciones en tejido y órganos (tales como engrosamiento del bazo y el hígado).

Estimación de 1/75,000 personas afectadas en todo el mundo.
Existencia de 3 tipos (tipos 2 y 3 más severos):

Tipo 1: más habitual, sin afectación del sistema nervioso.
Tipos 2 y 3: afectación del sistema nervioso (tipo 2: muerte habitual antes de los 2 años de edad).

 Mutación Génica: GBA (Herencia Autosómica Recesiva).




4. Enfermedad de Niemann Pick Tipo C - Info
Se trata de otra enfermedad involucrada en la acumulación de sustancias grasas dentro de las células, dando lugar a complicaciones en tejidos y órganos (incluyendo: cerebro, bazo e hígado).

Estimación de 1/120,000 personas afectadas en todo el mundo.
 Puede ocurrir entre la infancia y la edad adulta, pero normalmente en la infancia.
 Enfermedad siempre fatal (la mayoría mueren entre las edades de 10-25 años).
 Mutación Génica: NPC1 y/o NPC2 (Herencia Autosómica Recesiva).




5. Osteogénesis Imperfecta (Enfermedad de los huesos frágiles) - Info
Anomalías en la producción de colágeno que dan lugar a deformidades esqueléticas y fragilidades óseas.

Aproximadamente 6-7/100,00 personas afectadas en todo el mundo.
Hombres y mujeres igualmente afectados.
Existencia de al menos 8 tipos de la enfermedad.
 Tipos 1 y 4: Más habituales.

 Severidad de leve a moderada, próximo a la esperanza de vida normal (con soporte).

 Tipos 2 y 3: Más severos.

 Tipo 2: Frecuentemente letal en o después del nacimiento.
 Tipo 3: Inicio de fracturas en edad temprana, menor esperanza de vida.

 Mutación Génica: COL1A1 y/o COL1A2  son las más comunes (en la mayor parte de casos es Herencia Autosómica Dominante).








SOM Biotech SL (SOM) es un grupo biofarmacéutico establecido en 2009 en el Parque Científico de Barcelona (PCB). Nos dedicamos al descubrimiento y desarrollo de productos terapéuticos para enfermedades raras a través de la identificación de nuevos usos de productos terapéuticos existentes (reposicionamiento de fármacos).

Actualmente tenemos una cartera de programas en desarrollo que incluyen dos productos para enfermedades raras en estadios clínicos avanzados, para la Amiloidosis Hereditaria por Transtiretina y enfermedad de Huntington, ambos casos demostrando resultados muy positivos.
SOM Biotech también fue ganadora del premio Emprendedor XXI 2013, iniciativa impulsada por La Caixa Bank (uno de los bancos españoles más relevantes) en colaboración con el Ministerio de Industria, Energía y Turismo. Este prestigioso premio se entrega a empresas españolas de nueva creación con un alto potencial de crecimiento.




Como nueva iniciativa, SOM Biotech quiere centrarse en el descubrimiento de nuevas opciones terapéuticas para Enfermedades Raras Pediátricas. En concreto, nuestro objetivo es identificar y desarrollar una opción terapéutica para cada una de las 5 enfermedades raras pediátricas graves mencionadas.




SOM Biotech dispone de un sistema en propiedad de identificación de moléculas, capaz de identificar nuevas actividades para compuestos existentes que ya están en el mercado para otro uso. Tras el descubrimiento, los compuestos son validados experimentalmente y protegidos con patentes antes de llevar a cabo los ensayos clínicos de Fase II en pacientes. Las etapas posteriores de los proyectos se co-desarrollan con otras compañías farmacéuticas para así poder llegar al mercado lo antes posible.









El reposicionamiento de fármacos es un proceso de desarrollo de fármacos consistente en descubrir nuevas aplicaciones de productos terapéuticos existentes para otras enfermedades. El reposicionamiento utiliza la información de seguridad obtenida en desarrollos clínicos previos de los productos terapéuticos para su indicación original. En comparación con los nuevos medicamentos, en fármacos reposicionados, podemos evitar gran parte de los costes y tiempos asociados con dicho desarrollo clínico (por ejemplo, los ensayos clínicos de fase I).




Ha habido numerosos ejemplos de éxito en el campo del reposicionamiento de fármacos a lo largo de la historia de la industria farmacéutica. Claros ejemplos incluyen el Viagra, originalmente para la angina de pecho y reposicionado para la disfunción eréctil; y la Talidomida, originalmente desarrollado para las náuseas matutinas y posteriormente reposicionado para mielomas múltiples. Es importante tener en cuenta que también existe el riesgo de fracaso en  proyectos  de reposicionamiento de fármacos, tal como ocurre en cualquier proyecto de desarrollo clásico. Sin embargo, estos riesgos son significativamente menores.





 El objetivo de la iniciativa es recaudar al menos 300.000 $ USD.

 Los fondos se distribuirán uniformemente entre las 5 enfermedades raras pediátricas de estudio.

 SOM se compromete a cubrir la totalidad de los costes desde el desarrollo de las etapas iniciales de descubrimiento hasta su comercialización.









 Existe una financiación limitada para promover la investigación en los sectores de salud e investigación científica.

 Mejorar el conocimiento científico y/o clínico de las diversas enfermedades raras pediátricas.

 Proporcionar esperanza a los niños afectados por estas enfermedades raras, para las que no existe cura hasta la fecha o los tratamientos disponibles son ineficaces.

story:
522 Miles. 22 Days. The world's top distance runners, running for peace.

Our champions: Wilson Kipsang Kiprotich. Paul Tergat. Tegla Loroupe. Ezekiel Kemboi. John Kelai. Irine Jerotich. Andrew Lesuuda. Alex Kipchirchir. Stephen Kiprotich. Douglas Wakiihuri. Julius Arile. AND YOU...

Imagine hatred so strong it drives people to kill. Now imagine it in your town. In your neighbourhood. In your family. 

Hatred like this is happening right now, in Kenya's Rift Valley. People are dying, now. They are fleeing their homes, now.

The 2015 Walk for Peace brings together the world's top athletes, many of them Kenyan themselves, and the people of the Rift Valley in a powerful statement for peace and reconciliation between communities in conflict.

From 15 July to 8 August they will run and walk 522 miles through this troubled region, raising money and awareness for the peace education programs these communities so desperately need.

We need you to join this journey for peace by bringing your support to a program for peace-building that can sweep away the growing culture of armed violence destroying lives across Kenya’s Rift Valley, especially between the Turkana and Pokot communities. In the past 18 months alone, hundreds of people have been killed and hundreds of thousands displaced. 

“Supported by the Aegis Trust, which has shown how peace can be built in Rwanda, we are going to inspire and engage young people from divided communities, and help to break the cycles of violence,” says organiser and Commonwealth Gold Medallist John Kelai. For John, from Turkana County, it's personal. Three of his uncles were shot dead by Pokot cattle rustlers. Now former Pokot cattle rustler Julius Arile is one of the athletes taking part in the Walk for Peace. "Running has given us a platform to create change," he says. "Will you come with us?"


Who's involved - and what we'll do

Led by Kenya's star athletes and coordinated by the Aegis Trust, the Champions Walk for Peace aims to raise $250,000 for a peacebuilding programme that will engage directly with at least 10,000 young people at risk of being caught up in inter-ethnic violence in the Rift Valley - saving lives, preventing displacement and averting human suffering.

The project aims to build capacity for peace building in three main constituencies:

  • Women, because they have the ability to engage deeply and take strong leadership in peace building activities in spite of often being most disadvantaged by physical and sexual violence and other issues in conflict;
  • Religious leaders, because they have the capacity to be a strong pacifying influence at the national and community levels;
  • Youth, who are the future, who are at risk of becoming involved in violence and yet may be most receptive to education for peace.
The project also aims to promote pan-African support and cooperation between Kenya and Rwanda in service of peace, and to convey an inspiring message of hope and lessons learned from the experience of Rwanda.


Track record of success

This programme will be based on the successful model for peace-building that Aegis has developed in Rwanda. 

It will include exchange visits between Kenyan and Rwandan youth, the training of budding Kenyan community leaders as peace ambassadors, and the organisation of a series of locally-held workshops,  dialogue events and other cultural, community and athletic activities.

The programme will also draw on the unique advantage provided by the celebrity status of our athletics champions. They are known and admired in every community in Kenya, and immediately offer a focal point around which everyone has something in common - their love of athletics and their pride in Kenya's World-beating distance runners.

And thanks to our incredible champions, we also have a range of brilliant incentives for you to choose from when supporting this campaign! 

 Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute financially, don't worry! You could help support the effort by fundraising - for example, by getting sponsored on JustGiving to do a walk or run of your own during the Champions Walk for Peace. You could also support us by following and sharing our posts on Facebook and Twitter - and by using the Indiegogo share tools. 

"However you choose to support, on behalf of all the sporting champions and partners involved in this, I really want to thank you," says John Kelai. "We couldn't do this without you."
story_txt:
522 Miles. 22 Days. The world's top distance runners, running for peace. Our champions: Wilson Kipsang Kiprotich. Paul
Tergat. Tegla Loroupe. Ezekiel Kemboi. John Kelai. Irine Jerotich. Andrew
Lesuuda. Alex Kipchirchir. Stephen Kiprotich. Douglas Wakiihuri. Julius Arile.
AND YOU...




Imagine hatred so strong it drives people to kill. Now imagine it in your town. In your neighbourhood. In your family. 
Hatred like this is happening right now, in Kenya's Rift Valley. People are dying, now. They are fleeing their homes, now.
The 2015 Walk for Peace brings together the world's top athletes, many of them Kenyan themselves, and the people of the Rift Valley in a powerful statement for peace and reconciliation between communities in conflict.
From 15 July to 8 August they will run and walk 522 miles through this troubled region, raising money and awareness for the peace education programs these communities so desperately need.

We need you to join this journey for peace by bringing your support to a program for peace-building that can sweep away the growing culture of armed violence destroying lives across Kenya’s Rift Valley, especially between the Turkana and Pokot communities. In the past 18 months alone, hundreds of people have been killed and hundreds of thousands displaced. 


“Supported by the Aegis Trust, which has shown how peace can be built in Rwanda, we are going to inspire and engage young people from divided communities, and help to break the cycles of violence,” says organiser and Commonwealth Gold Medallist John Kelai. For John, from Turkana County, it's personal. Three of his uncles were shot dead by Pokot cattle rustlers. Now former Pokot cattle rustler Julius Arile is one of the athletes taking part in the Walk for Peace. "Running has given us a platform to create change," he says. "Will you come with us?"

Who's involved - and what we'll do

Led by Kenya's star athletes and coordinated by the Aegis Trust, the Champions Walk for Peace aims to raise $250,000 for a peacebuilding programme that will engage directly with at least 10,000 young people at risk of being caught up in inter-ethnic violence in the Rift Valley - saving lives, preventing displacement and averting human suffering.


The project aims to build capacity for peace building
in three main constituencies: 



Women, because they have the
ability to engage deeply and take strong leadership in peace building
activities in spite of often being most disadvantaged by physical and sexual
violence and other issues in conflict;


Religious leaders, because they
have the capacity to be a strong pacifying influence at the national and community
levels;

Youth, who are the future, who
are at risk of becoming involved in violence and yet may be most receptive to
education for peace.

The project also aims to promote pan-African
support and cooperation between Kenya and Rwanda in service of peace, and to
convey an inspiring message of hope and lessons learned from the experience of
Rwanda.


Track record of success


 This programme will be based on the successful model for peace-building that Aegis has developed in Rwanda. 
It will include exchange visits between Kenyan and Rwandan youth, the training of budding Kenyan community leaders as peace ambassadors, and the organisation of a series of locally-held workshops,  dialogue events and other cultural, community and
athletic activities.
The programme will also draw on the unique advantage provided by the celebrity status of our athletics champions. They are known and admired in every community in Kenya, and immediately offer a focal point around which everyone has something in common - their love of athletics and their pride in Kenya's World-beating distance runners.
And thanks to our incredible champions, we also have a range of brilliant incentives for you to choose from when supporting this campaign! 
   
 Other Ways You Can Help

 If you can't contribute financially, don't worry! You could help support the effort by fundraising - for example, by getting sponsored on JustGiving to do a walk or run of your own during the Champions Walk for Peace. You could also support us by following and sharing our posts on Facebook and Twitter - and by using the Indiegogo share tools. 
"However you choose to support, on behalf of all the sporting champions and partners involved in this, I really want to thank you," says John Kelai. "We couldn't do this without you."

story:
Give back to those who gave all

What is Veterans for Entheogenic Therapy (VET)?

We are a group of veterans seeking financial support from you to provide awareness, education, safety, and research around alternative options including ayahuasca for veterans suffering from a complex issue that is facing the nation today: Post-traumatic Stress Disorder or PTSD. Ryan LeCompte, the founder of VET is a former United States Marine infantryman (MOS 0311) who served on active-duty from 2007-2011. He is also a graduate student completing a Masters Degree in Transpersonal Counseling Psychology at Naropa University in Boulder, C.O.

VET members with Lisa Ling in Peru July 2014

What is Post-traumatic Stress Disorder (PTSD) and how badly is it affecting our veterans coming home?

Post-traumatic Stress Disorder or PTSD is a deeply distressing, or disturbing experience that creates an unresolved impact on the individual. Victims are often are not aware that the symptoms that they experience are a result of their trauma. They struggle in a kind of purgatory of anxiety that eludes their own conscious abilities. Mental illness represents not a cognitive impairment, but an attempted interpretation of inexplicable internal states. PTSD in short, is a pathological state of fear. 

Image rights belong to National Geographic Magazine

Treatment Challenges at the VA

PTSD shows a high-rate of treatment-resistance. Treatments in existence today are showing unresponsiveness to treatment. For those that do seek treatment, are often left feeling helpless due to a limiting capacity to offer resolution. 

Sgt. Candice Gagnon, USMC Afghan VET, AND VET member, talks about her own PTSD and ayahuasca

Right now, there are 22 veterans a day that are taking their own lives according to the Veterans Administration recent study. (This is excluding incidental deaths related to PTSD, such as drunk driving, etc.) My brothers and sisters are turning to “self-medicating” as a result of the endless discrepancies and numerous issues at the VA sometimes caused by under-staffing, which leads to a backlog in providing the proper and necessary treatment to veterans who are on the brink of life and death to due mental illness. A recent story released by the New York Times covered the forced retirement of several top executives at the VA, has clearly added to the list of reasons for the consideration of alternative treatment for veterans with a resistance to therapy. Here are just a few links both anecdotal and scientific findings) that add to the long list:

http://www.defense.gov/news/newsarticle.aspx?id=116832

http://www.va.gov/opa/docs/suicide-data-report-2012-final.pdf

http://www.nytimes.com/2014/10/17/us/after-hospital-scandal-va-officials-jump-ship.html?_r=0

http://exopermaculture.com/2013/01/07/vietnam-vet-who-suffered-from-ptsd-about-ayahuasca-its-an-eye-opener-it-makes-you-think-about-stuff-your-deepest-darkest-secrets-stuff-you-have-been-holding-on-to-since-you-were-eight/

http://www.alternet.org/story/145892/are_veterans_being_given_deadly_cocktails_to_treat_ptsd

http://www.usmedicine.com/agencies/department-of-defense-dod/potential-overuse-of-antipsychotic-drugs-for-ptsd-patients-is-under-review/

http://www.nytimes.com/2011/02/13/us/13drugs.html?pagewanted=all&_r=0

What is Ayahuasca?

You are not alone if you have no idea what ayahuasca is or means. Ayahuasca is the name given to both the vine ( banisteriopsis caapi ) and the psychotropic drink prepared by boiling the vine together with various admixtures plants. Here in Iquitos the most common admixture used is “chacruna” ( psychotria vidris ) or “chalipunga”, another plant in the chacruna family. 




More info here: http://www.vetentheogenic.squarespace.com/resources-and-education/

And here: http://www.ayahuasca-info.com/introduction/

VET recently organized a trip with fellow veterans diagnosed with treatment-resistant chronic PTSD to travel to Peru and Lisa Ling from CNN followed us on our journey that was aired on prime-time national news. The name of the series is called, “This is Life” w/ Lisa Ling and the episode is called Jungle Fix. The full episode can be seen on Sundays at 10pm EST on CNN or below 




Full-length documentary - 

Here is a full length article from a fellow Marine, Richard Stroder who deployed to Iraq and was diagnosed with PTSD after he got home. He explains how his ayahuasca retreat with VET last year has helped him.

http://www.cnn.com/2014/10/23/opinion/veteran-p...


Here is a podcast that VET founder, Ryan LeCompte did with Dr. Rick Doblin, founder of MAPS where they talked about PTSD and psychedelics in veterans. 

How can you help?

Veterans for Entheogenic Therapy (VET) hopes to become a nonprofit and complete related missions with your help. Your contribution will assist our organization with:

  • Filing for a 501.C3 nonprofit - we want to be more sustainable by enabling folks to donate whenever they can afford it, and being a nonprofit will allow for that.
  • Funding our IRB-approved observational study looking at the effects of ayahuasca on chronic post-traumatic stress disorder or PTSD in U.S. veterans
  • We organize group retreats with PTSD veterans to Peru and other countrys where ayahuasca is fully legal (This includes flight, housing, ground transportation, food and general retreat expenses) This program has not yet reached its full potential as many of the veterans supporting these trips are volunteering time outside of their jobs)
  • Publicly addressing the need for alternative treatment options for veterans by speaking at conferences around the country related to the topic of PTSD (VA, American Legion, Veterans of Foreign Wars, National Research Center for PTSD, Psychedelic Science) and required administrative and logistical support that comes with outreach. 

Our Goal is to reach $20,000 in 45 days, every donation helps!

Please help veterans find the piece that they deserve. Veterans who have already come forward about this medicine have stamped approval, we have our mission to combat suicide, now we need your help to carry out our orders. If we exceed our fund-raising goals, the funds will go directly toward mission efforts of organizing retreats and funding veterans expenses.

What you get

Every donor will get the satisfaction of knowing that they contributed to a cause that will provide relief for veterans where other treatment options have failed. You will also be provided with personal testimony from a veteran diagnosed with PTSD who benefited from your donation as a result of our ayahuasca retreats.

Donors who contribute a minimum of $50 will receive a VET Logo T-shirt. This will be contingent on whether or not we meet our fundraising goal of $20,000. 


The Impact

There are two fronts that Veterans for Entheogenic Therapy are fighting on:
  1. Science - We are working with various research organizations in the field of psychiatry, psychology, neurology, behavioral pharmacology, ethnobotany, and many more  including Rick Doblin, founder of the Multi-Disciplinary Association for Psychedelic Studies (MAPS), Dennis McKenna and David Nichols of the Heffter Institute, as well as many other researchers in the field of psychdelics and PTSD. VET is in this for the long haul, and through science our goal is to give ayahuasca and other psychedelics their place among medicine in the United States. This may take decades, but if we have the support to conduct rigorous scientific research the road can be paved. Currently, the founder of VET, Ryan LeCompte, a former Marine infantryman and M.A. candidate at Naropa University in Boulder, CO, is conducting an observational study with IRB-approval through his graduate program. This study will show the medical and scientific community that ayahuasca can be a viable treatment option for veterans diagnosed with treatment-resistant PTSD. Here are studies currently being conducted looking at psychedelics and various mental health issues.
  2. Community Outreach - In addition to our 12 veteran observational study, we have an overwhelming number of veterans seeking treatment that cannot afford the costly expenses of travel and accommodations required to attend retreats in Peru. Meanwhile, every day that passes we lose 22 of our nation's warriors to suicide. In response to the requests from veterans, we want to narrow down our organizational capabilities and efficiency by increasing the number of trips to Peru as we can. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some of you just cannot afford to donate, but that doesn't mean you can't help! Here are some ways you can:

  • Get the word out about our study, organization and our campaign to raise funds - military folks are loud, and we give you our blessing to do the same :)
  • Link and share, copy and paste. Use Facebook, Twitter, and other social media networks to get the word out. Here is the link: 
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools
Thank you for taking the time to hear our story. Anyone reading this right now has the opportunity to email us and ask unanswered questions or concerns. Email rjlecompte@gmail.com or go to our website and facebook page. 

www.vetentheogenic.org    www.facebook.com/vetentheogenic

Additional big thanks to:

Dr. Gabor Mate, for his endorsement of this project. 

Dr. Will Vanderveer, for his continued support 

Dr. Rick Doblin, for his vision and support

Julie Megler and Dr. Jessica Nielson for her bravery in helping with this research

Dr. Dennis McKenna and Dr. David Nichols, for their decades of research efforts with ayahuasca and other psychedelic medicines

Janine Sagert and Luc Cote for telling our stories as they really are

Nell Constantinople, Geoffrey O'Connor, Tony Hardmon, Lisa Ling and all of CNN for following us down the rabbit hole last July and telling our story

The plant teachers, for their infinite wisdom and offering their support to us, including the Shipibo practitioners in Peru who dedicate their lives to healing illness

And everyone else who has supported this project in some way!


Semper Fidelis,
Ryan LeCompte
Founder, Veterans for Entheogenic Therapy

story:
I'm a college junior majoring in International Relations and minoring in Non-Profit Studies.  As part of a three-semester thesis project through my university's Honors program, I will be one-woman-showing the creation of a documentary on girls' education.  My project will focus on the impacts of refugee situations on the schooling of girls and young women.  For me, this is both an exciting academic opportunity and a passion project; I'm invested in the quality and success of the final product both because of the magnitude and academic implications of this endeavor, and my personal interest and emotional ties to the subject matter.

The funds from this campaign will be primarily used for the purchase of a camera and other film equipment.  If my goal is reached, somewhere around a third of the money will likely be spent on a film-capable camera.  The remainder will be used to purchase a portable microphone, a basic portable light, a tripod and, if possible, a second lens for the camera.   If the goal is not reached, what is raised will be used to at least combat the costs, if it can not counteract them entirely.

I'm not under any illusions about how much time and work this project is going to require, but I know my enthusiasm for it and its success will give me the drive I'll need to give it everything the task requires, and more.  The experience will be a learning curve for sure, but I also know there's no better way to acquire a skill than to just do it.  

Obviously, monetary donations (of all sizes--seriously, even if you only have a few bucks to pitch, it will make a difference) are the main goal of this campaign, but if you can't help financially, I'd appreciate your spreading the word just as much.  Use the share tools to post my campaign to Facebook, Twitter, Tumblr--anywhere you think it might get some love--and you can help me reach my goal.

Thanks so much for your support. And now: Lights! Camera! Action!

story:
SECOND NATIONAL JOTERIA CONFERENCE


After hosting four successful and inspiring jotería encuentros—at UNLV in 2007, Cal State LA in 2009, the University of Oregon in 2010, and at the University of New Mexico in 2012—we are back to offer you yet another amazing experience of Jotería community-building, art and performance space, and scholarship. We are less than one month away from hosting our second national Association for Jotería Arts, Activism, and Scholarship (AJAAS) conference! Please help make this event a reality! The conference is entitled Re-Imagining JoteríAZ: Queer Gatherings en Movimiento and will take place at several locations in Downtown Phoenix, AZ on October 15-18, 2015.

By bringing together various queer artists, activists, students, scholars, and members of the community, we will create a shared space where we continue to wield agency and honor the legacy of survival, resilience, and resistance among queer communities.

We welcome participation from all queer communities creating spaces of equality, equity, safety, inclusiveness, and empowerment regardless of ethnic background, gender orientation, or nationality. Please join us! To register for the conference, please sign-up at http://www.ajaas.com/.

WHO WE ARE

​The Association of Jotería Arts, Activism, and Scholarship

Mission: 

To nurture queer Latina/o, Chicana/o, and Indigenous individuals and communities through practices that recognize the importance of linking art, activism, and scholarship.

Vision: 

A presence of love
Of healing
Of communing among generations
Of solidarity and imagination
Of self-actualization
Where continuous movement of our minds, bodies, and spirits is encouraged
A world where violence is challenged
Where we voice our pain
Where we heal each other
A world of renewal
A future of abundance
Of transformation
A future where we are autonomous
And free.

We envision a world that affirms Jotería consciousness and that celebrates multiple pathways for generating knowledge, sharing experiences, and becoming catalysts for social change. We seek to live in a world free of all forms of ideological, institutional, interpersonal and internalized oppression.

PLEASE GIVE

Our budget is a little over $8,000 for speakers (including transportation, hotel accommodations, and honorarium); publicity; food, and event services. We also want to raise at least $1000 for the youth and elder component of the conference. Depending on how much we raise, we would like to provide scholarships for students, undocumented queer youth, community members, folks from rural Arizona, and individuals who need support getting to Phoenix. As we all know, many universities and colleges are facing difficult budget situations. Still, we have been actively fund-raising with our allies at academic institutions. Our sponsors (to date) include:

· Arizona State University, The Program for Transborder Communities

· University of Nevada, Las Vegas—Gender and Sexuality Studies and Interdisciplinary Degree Programs

· University of Oregon—Women’s Studies and Ethnic Studies

· Down Under Hair Design, Oneonta, New York

· Even with these academic supporters, we still need at least $8000 to complete our goal. Furthermore, any extra funds that come in will be directly used for scholarships and costs accrued by the local planning committee during this conference. If we do not reach our goal, the priorities for the budget will be to get keynote speakers to the conference, provide food for folks who do not have the funds to eat lunch/breakfast on their own, and to ensure that a collective of youth, artists and community members are able to join us.

We have the great honor of having amazing artists, activists, and scholars in our organization that would like to share their wonderful creations and productions with you, so we have a wide array of gifts to offer you in exchange for your generous donations. These gifts include t-shirts, tote bags, novels, original hand-made jewelry, chapbooks of poetry, academic books, and original art! Thank you to all of our amazing donors for the "perks". Every donor will receive a ‘thank you’ post card with amazing jotería photos or art on it.

REASONS TO GIVE

1. WE ARE PROVIDING SCHOLARSHIPS FOR UNDOCUMENTED MEMBERS OF OUR COMMUNITY!

2. WE HAVE A SUCCESSFUL TRACK RECORD WITH PRODUCING INSPIRING AND ENGAGING CONFERENCES. This is your opportunity to continue this practice and help us to expand our vision of creating space for Jotería arts, activism and scholarship and linking many of our worlds together.

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean you can’t help:

Please get the word out and let folks know about this campaign. And please join us for the conference on October 16-17, 2015. Register at: http://ajaas.webs.com/

If you are a member of a university of organization and you would like to sign up to become an institutional member, please go to: http://www.ajaas.com/--institutional-membership...

SECOND NATIONAL
JOTERIA CONFERENCE



After hosting
four successful and inspiring jotería encuentros—at UNLV in 2007, Cal State LA
in 2009, the University of Oregon in 2010, and at the University of New Mexico
in 2012—we are back to offer you yet another amazing experience of Jotería
community-building, art and performance space, and scholarship. We are less than one month away from hosting our second national Association for
Jotería Arts, Activism, and Scholarship (AJAAS) conference! Please help make
this event a reality! The conference is entitled Re-Imagining JoteríAZ: Queer
Gatherings en Movimiento and will take place at several locations in Downtown
Phoenix, AZ on October 15-18, 2015.
By bringing
together various queer artists, activists, students, scholars, and members of
the community, we will create a shared space where we continue to wield agency
and honor the legacy of survival, resilience, and resistance among queer
communities.
We welcome
participation from all queer communities creating spaces of equality, equity,
safety, inclusiveness, and empowerment regardless of ethnic background, gender
orientation, or nationality. Please join us! To register for the
conference, please sign-up at http://www.ajaas.com/.
WHO WE ARE
​The
Association of Jotería Arts, Activism, and Scholarship
Mission: 
To
nurture queer Latina/o, Chicana/o, and Indigenous individuals and communities
through practices that recognize the importance of linking art, activism, and
scholarship.
Vision: 
A
presence of love
Of healing
Of communing among generations
Of solidarity and imagination
Of self-actualization
Where continuous movement of our minds, bodies, and spirits is encouraged
A world where violence is challenged
Where we voice our pain
Where we heal each other
A world of renewal
A future of abundance
Of transformation
A future where we are autonomous
And free.
We
envision a world that affirms Jotería consciousness and that
celebrates multiple pathways for generating knowledge, sharing
experiences, and becoming catalysts for social change. We seek to live in
a world free of all forms of ideological, institutional, interpersonal and
internalized oppression.
PLEASE GIVE
Our budget is a
little over $8,000 for speakers (including transportation,
hotel accommodations, and honorarium); publicity; food, and event services. We
also want to raise at least $1000 for the youth and elder
component of the conference. Depending on how much we raise, we would like to
provide scholarships for students, undocumented queer youth, community members,
folks from rural Arizona, and individuals who need support getting to Phoenix.
As we all know, many universities and colleges are facing difficult budget
situations. Still, we have been actively fund-raising with our allies at
academic institutions. Our sponsors (to date) include:
· Arizona
State University, The Program for Transborder Communities
· University
of Nevada, Las Vegas—Gender and Sexuality Studies and Interdisciplinary Degree
Programs
· University
of Oregon—Women’s Studies and Ethnic Studies
· Down
Under Hair Design, Oneonta, New York
· Even
with these academic supporters, we still need at least $8000 to complete our
goal. Furthermore, any extra funds that come in will be directly used for
scholarships and costs accrued by the local planning committee during this
conference. If we do not reach our goal, the priorities for the budget will be
to get keynote speakers to the conference, provide food for folks who do not
have the funds to eat lunch/breakfast on their own, and to ensure that a
collective of youth, artists and community members are able to join us.
We have the
great honor of having amazing artists, activists, and scholars in our
organization that would like to share their wonderful creations and productions
with you, so we have a wide array of gifts to offer you in exchange for your
generous donations. These gifts include t-shirts, tote bags, novels, original hand-made jewelry, chapbooks
of poetry, academic books, and original art! Thank you to all of our
amazing donors for the "perks". Every donor will receive a ‘thank you’
post card with amazing jotería photos or art on it.

REASONS TO GIVE
1. WE ARE PROVIDING SCHOLARSHIPS FOR UNDOCUMENTED MEMBERS OF OUR COMMUNITY!
2. WE HAVE A SUCCESSFUL TRACK RECORD WITH PRODUCING INSPIRING AND ENGAGING CONFERENCES. This is your opportunity to continue this practice and help us to expand our vision of creating space for Jotería arts, activism and scholarship and linking many of our worlds together.

Other Ways You Can Help
We understand that some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean you can’t help:
Please get the word out and let folks know about this campaign. And please join us for the conference on October 16-17, 2015. Register at: http://ajaas.webs.com/If you are a member of a university of organization and you would like to sign up to become an institutional member, please go to: http://www.ajaas.com/--institutional-membership...

story:
***THANK YOU INDIVIDUAL DONORS!!!*** We've received $2,500 in direct individual donations to Salt Spring Elementary for the Hillside Garden, in addition to online donors here! Please help us reach our goal of $3,500 total by contributing here or via check to SSE, only $750 to go!  

Growing food is an experience and a skill that all children should have. Farming celebrates our past and will contribute to a more resilient future. Locally, produced, organic food supports pollinators, people, and lowers our carbon footprint. Studies have shown that gardening enhances childrens' imagination, decreases aggression, and boosts classroom performance. A garden will also create new ways to connect with the many agricultural organisations and events on the Island, such as Seedy Saturday, the Fall Fair, weekly markets, the Farmers Institute, Island Growers, and many more.

Parents and teachers at Salt Spring Elementary (194 kids), Saltspring Middle School (300 students), and the ELF preschool program want to share gardening experiences with their children. The Garden Committee plans to construct this multi-school garden located on a sunny hillside by providing better access from classrooms and by installing terraced, raised beds, mulched pathways, stairs, and seating. A strong deer fence already protects the rocky, south-facing slope, but it lacks necessary safety, access, and moisture retention infrastructure. A hose spigot and electricity are nearby, as well as roof downspouts for potential rainwater harvest.

We are working closely with teachers and community partners. Farmers, growers and gatherers are the backbone of Salt Spring Island, and local experts in gardening and farming, seed saving, and ecologists are already involved with school programs. Access to a safe, terraced garden will enhance these programs. The new garden will include hands-on experiences with native vegetation; pollinator-friendly plantings; growing and harvesting fruit trees, berries, and vegetables; and composting and permaculture techniques.

With new Nature Programs at the school, fresh support from teachers and parents, and better infrastructure, we aim to engage students in transforming this exposed slope into a beautiful outdoor classroom and food-growing garden. Specifically, your grant would fund eight 3'x8' terraced, raised beds constructed using sustainable rammed earth technology, hand-built by school families and community volunteers.

To build these, local businesses are donating time, expertise, sand and soil, and excavation - thank you Charles Excavating & Terra Firma! And, we'll need lots of volunteers with strong backs! But, we'll need to pay for materials and machine rentals. For example, we'll need a compressor for two long weekends $350/weekend and a mixer at $200/weekend, plus delivery costs ($300). Other materials include lumber (32 4'x8' sheets of 2" plywood=$150;) and sediment (Portland cement 48 bags = $720; 16 cu yd 3/4 crush and concrete 30/yd =$480). In addition, we need dimple board liners ($240) and a water-repellant silicone add-mixture ($480). We hope to construct these starting over April's Easter weekend and completing them over Earth Day, 2017.

story:
Why now?

"Federal court finds online agreements are binding, regardless of whether customers read or understand them." (Aug. 17, 2017, Greg Bensinger, Wall Street Journal)

We realize most people do not review legal Terms & Conditions before signing. Go figure - most of us don't have the time.

For example, as of August 28th, Google's Terms & Conditions is 4,099 words long which takes the average reader 25 minutes!

In this digital age, we're being confronted by these Terms & Conditions with increasing frequency.  They find us when downloading apps, shopping online, connecting to public WiFi, joining internet communities, etc...

TermSAFE™'s team of legal-understanding superheroes provide educated opinions on the Terms & Conditions that most people don't know how to read.

 

Our Founding Story

The idea of TermSAFE™ was born out of parental instincts.

Gerry, a father, husband, and family-business owner in Connecticut, has been concerned about internet safety for his children since Windows '95.  Now, in 2017, while the average internet user has learned to be careful about sharing sensitive information, 'protecting users from Terms & Conditions' has fallen to the wayside.   We've all become accustom to "clicking agree".  It's muscle memory now, it's not your fault.

TermSAFE™ is on a global mission to provide instant, educated opinions about the T&C's you're about to agree to, at the point of purchase, sign up, activation, and so on, so you, your family, your neighbors and friends can finally all Feel Free To Click Agree™.

 

What We Need & What You Get

In order for TermSAFE™ to provide instant reviews so you to FEEL FREE TO CLICK AGREE™, we are asking for $25,000.

The money raised from this campaign will be used to fund:

  1. The reviewing of thousands of Terms & Conditions ($15,000) and
  2. The development of a mobile application, providing a platform for requesting reviews, community discussion, as well as monitoring updates on our growing list of TermSAFE™ reviewed Terms & Conditions ($10,000).

This money is only the beginning for our mission of providing FREE reviews to consumers.

In the event we do not reach our goal, we will use all funds raised to fund the reviewing of thousands of Terms & Conditions

 

The Impact

We understand that everyone is aware of Terms and Conditions but very few people take the time to read them. And, those who don’t read them, often feel a pang of remorse or worry about what they signed.  TermSAFE™ exists to help people and protect people.

TermSAFE™ is attempting to change the current paradigm where most people are very trusting and willing to sign virtually anything. We are trying to assist people by giving advice as well as letting people know how dangerous a practice blindly signing can be.

All web users can assist in our mission of education so everyone can Feel Free to Click Agree ™

 

Risks & Challenges

We certainly have a big challenge ahead but are reminded of the story of the little boy throwing back starfish from the beach into the water. His mother asks him, “Billy, there are thousands of starfish on the beach…surely you can’t throw them all back”. To which, Bill replied, “But Mom, for that Starfish, I meant the world!”

For every person we help, we feel great and feel validated. We have a huge mission ahead, but you can be one of the first to help spread the mission of TermSAFE™.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If donating isn't for you, TermSAFE™ appreciates if YOU can help GET THE WORD OUT about our campaign! We want the whole world to hear about the BIGGEST LIE ON THE INTERNET! Share the TermSAFE™ love via our Facebook, Twitter, or our Website. We want to help you FEEL FREE TO CLICK AGREE™

TermSAFE™ thanks you for your support of our campaign!

story:
(For English keep scrolling :)  

 

Κίνημα #PHILOTIMO

Διαδίδοντας το ‘Φιλότιμο’ ως τη νέα διεθνή λέξη του 2017.

Όχι δεν είμαστε νεοφυές πολιτικό κίνημα. Τουλάχιστον όχι με την παραδοσιακή έννοια. Αν θεωρήσουμε Πολιτική την συνισταμένη των ηθικών συμπεριφορών των μελών μιας κοινωνίας, από τον πρώτο έως τον τελευταίο πολίτη, τότε ναι, κάνουμε πολιτική. Πολιτική της ορθής σκέψης και των αγνών συναισθημάτων που εκφράζονται μέσα από την έννοια Φιλότιμο. Λέξη-επικεφαλίδα κάθε ένδοξου κεφαλαίου του ελληνικού πολιτισμού, στα θεμέλια του σύγχρονου παγκόσμιου.

Η πρόταση μας είναι απλή. Βοηθήστε να επαναπροσδιορίσουμε τη λέξη Φιλότιμο μεταξύ μας και κατόπιν να την εισαγάγουμε στα διεθνή λεξικά μεταφρασμένη στα αγγλικά ως ‘Philotimo’.

Γιατί χρίζει το ‘Φιλότιμο’ επαναπροσδιορισμού;

Γιατί απλά όπως κάθε έννοια στο επίκεντρο της ζωής του Πολίτη, όπως η ελευθερία, η δημοκρατία, η δικαιοσύνη, και τα ανθρώπινα δικαιώματα μεταξύ άλλων, αναπόδραστα χρωματίζονται και επαξιώνονται (ή απαξιώνονται) μέσα στον ρου της εξέλιξης της σύγχρονης κοινωνίας και στους συσχετισμούς μεταξύ ατομικού και κοινωνικού συμφέροντος. Ξεκινώντας από το Φιλότιμο, τον ακρογωνιαίο λίθο του πολιτισμικού μας DNA, έχουμε καλύτερες πιθανότητες να καταλήξουμε σε κοινή συναίνεση δίχως την ανάγκη μεσαζόντων (ίσως εκτός μιας ανεξάρτητης επιστημονικής ομάδας). Η διαδικασία θα μας βοηθήσει να αναγνωρίσουμε την αξία της κοινής συναίνεσης ως πρωταρχικό συστατικό κοινωνικής συνοχής και εθνικής ταυτότητας, και των προκλήσεων αλλά και ευεργετημάτων που επιφυλάσσει ο διάλογος παρόμοιων διαδικασιών. Τέλος, η διαδικασία επαναπροσδιορισμού της έννοιας Φιλότιμο, ίσως μας βοηθήσει να προσπελάσουμε αναχρονιστικά εθνικά αφηγήματα που αναστέλλουν την συμβίωση και πρόοδο μας εντός μιας παγκόσμιας διεθνούς κοινότητας.

Γιατί να το εισαγάγουμε στα διεθνή λεξικά;

Γιατί είναι το απλούστερο συλλογικό εγχείρημα στο οποίο μπορούμε όλοι να συμβάλλουμε από όπου κι αν βρισκόμαστε, μέσα από τον υπολογιστή ή το κινητό μας. Γιατί αποτελεί παράλληλα διεκδίκηση θέσης αλλά και παραχώρηση χρήσης μια έννοιας με πανανθρώπινο νόημα. Για να ανατρέξει κανείς στην τελευταία φορά που Ελληνική λέξη εποίκησε ξένο λεξικό ή λεξιλόγιο θα πρέπει να γυρίσει πίσω αρκετούς αιώνες. Πίσω στον καιρό όπου ο Ελληνικός πολιτισμός εξάσκησε και τελειοποίησε μέσα από λέξεις-σύμβολα καινοτομίες όπως την φιλοσοφία, τη ρητορική, τη δημοκρατία, τον Ολυμπισμό. Όλοι θυμόμαστε την «Αθήνα» που κατέκτησε την κατακτήτρια «Ρώμη» με τη γλώσσα και τις τέχνες της. Γιατί τέλος, η παγκόσμια κοινότητα είναι έτοιμη να δεχτεί την καινοτομία στο επίπεδο συσχετισμών Πολίτη-Συμπολίτη και Πολιτείας-Πολιτών όσο ποτέ άλλοτε στη σύγχρονη ιστορία της. Και γιατί ίσως η ιδέα Φιλότιμο, πρώτα ζυμωμένη μεταξύ Ελλήνων, αποτελέσει φάρο νοήματος και για τους «έξω».

 

Η Πρωτοβουλία

Η Πρωτοβουλία #Philotimo ξεκίνησε από το Λονδίνο το 2011, με τη συνειδητοποίηση του ερευνητικού κενού στη σύγχρονη διεθνή βιβλιογραφία γύρω από την σύνθετη έννοια της λέξης Φιλότιμο την κεντρικότερη αξία της Ελληνικής πολιτισμικής ταυτότητας. Η ιδέα του να αναζητηθεί το «χαμένο φιλότιμο» όπως συχνά αναφέρεται, ξεκίνησε ένα συναρπαστικό ταξίδι με απίθανες συμπτώσεις και εποικοδομητικές συναντήσεις που οδήγησαν στην δημιουργία της μη-κερδοσκοπικής startup πλατφόρμας σκέψης/δράσης «Φιλότιμο Ίδρυμα» τον Σεπτέμβριο του 2014.

Αποτελούμαστε από μια διεθνή ομάδα φίλων, εξειδικευμένων σε πεδία μεταξύ άλλων της ψυχολογίας και των κοινωνικών επιστημών, του μάρκετινγκ, της ιατρικής, της στατιστικής επιστήμης και της επιστήμης υπολογιστών, όπου ένωσε γύρω από αυτό τον σκοπό τις ιδέες, τις δυνάμεις και τις οικονομίες της. Ξεκινήσαμε τη συλλογή δεδομένων γύρω από ορισμούς και ιστορίες για το Φιλότιμο μέσα από τη διεθνή κοινότητα Ελλήνων. Σύντομα διαπιστώσαμε την κεντρικότητα της έννοιας στην κοινωνική συνοχή και την αγωγή του πολίτη εντός Ελλάδας αλλά και διεθνώς.

 

Η Αποστολή

Το Φιλότιμο είναι μια λέξη που δεν μπορεί να αναπαραχθεί από το «σύστημα». Επάνω στην οποία όμως αυτό βασίζεται στις κρισιμότερες ώρες για να επιβιώσει και να ανανεωθεί.

Πιστεύουμε ότι το κλίμα σήμερα στην Ελλάδα και τον κόσμο ευνοεί για να ξεκινήσει ένας διάλογος γύρω από το τι είναι καλό και ωφέλιμο για την κοινωνία και την ανθρωπότητα, και τί όχι. Είναι ίσως η κρισιμότερη στιγμή για να εισαγάγουμε τη λέξη #PHILOTIMO στον κόσμο ως το αντίδοτο απέναντι σε λέξεις όπως την Μετά-Αλήθεια, την Ξενοφοβία και την ιδέα ενός Σουρεαλιστικού κόσμου (έννοιες που διακρίθηκαν στα διεθνή λεξικά το 2016).

Αποστολή μας να κάνουμε το πρώτο βήμα ανάδειξης της λέξης παγκοσμίως με την εισαγωγή της στα διεθνή λεξικά (ενδεχομένως ακριβώς κάτω από τη λέξη ‘Φιλοσοφία’), παρακινώντας ένα διεθνές κίνημα ανάδειξής της ως μία από τις νέες λέξεις του 2017!

Επιπλέον σκοπός μας η προεργασία διεθνούς Ντοκιμαντέρ γύρω από την ιστορία, τη θεωρία, την επιστήμη και το κοινωνικό κεφάλαιο του ‘Φιλότιμου’ με τη συνδρομή της πολυαγαπημένης εταιρείας παραγωγών “Indigo View" («Το Νησί», «Η Λέξη Που Δε Λες»). 

Τέλος, αποσκοπούμε στην ανάπτυξη τεκμηριωμένων εφαρμογών διερεύνησης και καλλιέργειας της έννοιας και πρακτικής του φιλότιμου μέσα σε περιβάλλοντα όπως τον εκπαιδευτικό και εργασιακό τομέα, και τις σχέσεις πολιτείας-πολίτη.

 

Πώς μπορείτε να βοηθήσετε

Έως και τις 27 Ιανουαρίου 2017 μπορείτε να μας ενισχύσετε με ένα ποσό, μικρό όσο 2 ευρώ (περίπου $3) ή ανάλογο των δυνατοτήτων σας, μέσα από την πλατφόρμα συμμετοχικής χρηματοδότησης IndieGoGo (https://igg.me/at/philotimo). Από την πλευρά μας δεσμευόμαστε ότι θα γνωρίζετε ανά πάσα στιγμή που πήγε μέχρι και το τελευταίο ευρώ. Ως επιβράβευση των συνδρομών προσφέρουμε δώρα όπως ένα Μεγάλο Ευχαριστώ στα κοινωνικά μας δίκτυα, την ονομαστική αναφορά συνδρομητών στο Ντοκιμαντέρ ‘Φιλότιμο’, μπλουζάκια της καμπάνιας #PHILOTIMO, συμμετοχή στο καλοκαιρινό καταφύγιο ‘Philotimo Retreat’ και στο επιμορφωτικό εταιρικό σεμινάριο Phi.Lo.Ti.Mo. διαμορφωμένο από τους ειδικούς της ομάδας μας.

Αν δεν έχετε τη δυνατότητα να μας στηρίξετε οικονομικά, σας ζητάμε να χρησιμοποιήσετε την ετικέτα #PHILOTIMO στα κοινωνικά σας δίκτυα όσο συχνότερα μπορείτε για να μοιραστείτε σκέψεις, συναισθήματα και ιστορίες γύρω από το Φιλότιμο, και έτσι να γίνετε συνοδοιπόροι στην εκστρατεία διάδοσης της λέξης.

Κάθε μορφή βοήθειας από τις παραπάνω είναι εξίσου σημαντική και πολύτιμη.

Υπεράνω όλων, θα λάβετε την προσωπική ικανοποίηση και την αναγνώριση από όλους εμάς για τη συμμετοχή σας σε αυτό το μοναδικό διεθνές κίνημα για να αλλάξουμε λίγο τον κόσμο, μια φιλότιμη χειρονομία τη φορά.

Ας κάνουμε μαζί το #PHILOTIMO τη λέξη που πρέπει να λες, τη λέξη που όλος ο κόσμος θα πρέπει να λέει!

Μόνο μαζί μπορούμε.

Φιλότιμο Ίδρυμα

www.philotimo.org

www.facebook.com/philotimon

-------------------------------------------------------

THE STORY

The Philotimo Initiative began in London in 2011, following the realization of a research gap within international bibliography around the complex concept of “philotimo”- a concept central to Greek cultural identity. The idea to explore the “lost philotimo,” as it’s often referred to by Greeks, began an fascinating journey of improbable coincidences and illumined encounters that led to the incorporation of the non-profit Think/Do startup "Philotimo Foundation” in September 2014.

We are an international group of friends, experts in our respective fields ranging from psychology to marketing, statistical and computer science. We began by collecting data and engaging the international community of Greeks to help us redefine the world ‘philotimo’ in the 21st century (think of it like citizenship, or moral judgment, they are both time and place specific). The more data we gathered, the more certain we became of #PHILOTIMO’s centrality in what constitutes 'social glue' and good citizenship today.

 

THE MISSION

Philotimo is a word that can’t be reproduced by the “system” , upon which the system however relies in its darkest hour to be revived and renewed.

We believe that there couldn’t be better timing for the need to engage in an open dialogue around what constitutes good and what not for society. No better timing to introduce a word like #PHILOTIMO to the world as the antidote to words such as Post-Truth, Xenophobia and the sense of living in a Surreal world!

With your support we will be able to take the first steps in gaining momentum for Philotimo and petition its entry across international dictionaries, possibly right under the word ‘Philosophy’,  and spread its meaning globally hoping to create a world trend by the end of 2017.

Furthermore, you will be helping us initiate the production of a Feature Documentary on the history, theory, science and social capital of philotimo, featuring expert personalities across cultures and disciplines.

A partner in this will be the highly acclaimed production team of “Indigo View" !

 

What We Need & What You Get

We ask you to contribute as much as you can afford starting from $3 (~ €2), and we promise you will know how we've spent your money right to the last penny!

If you are unable to support us financially, we ask that you use the hashtag #PHILOTIMO to share thoughts, feelings and stories (or our campaign page) about philotimo across your social networks. This is equally valuable and important!!

In exchange you will receive gifts such as a Big Thank You note, credits in the Philotimo Documentary, exclusive Philotimo T-Shirts, participation in our Philotimo Retreats this summer in Greece, or the Corporate Phi.Lo.Ti.Mo training for your company if so you choose.

Most importantly you will receive the satisfaction and our recognition for taking part in a unique international movement to change the world, one philotimous gesture at a time!

Spread the word #PHILOTIMO and join us on the journey!
story_txt: (For English keep scrolling :)   Κίνημα #PHILOTIMOΔιαδίδοντας το ‘Φιλότιμο’ ως τη νέα διεθνή λέξη του 2017.Όχι δεν είμαστε νεοφυές πολιτικό κίνημα. Τουλάχιστον όχι με την παραδοσιακή έννοια. Αν θεωρήσουμε Πολιτική την συνισταμένη των ηθικών συμπεριφορών των μελών μιας κοινωνίας, από τον πρώτο έως τον τελευταίο πολίτη, τότε ναι, κάνουμε πολιτική. Πολιτική της ορθής σκέψης και των αγνών συναισθημάτων που εκφράζονται μέσα από την έννοια Φιλότιμο. Λέξη-επικεφαλίδα κάθε ένδοξου κεφαλαίου του ελληνικού πολιτισμού, στα θεμέλια του σύγχρονου παγκόσμιου.Η πρόταση μας είναι απλή. Βοηθήστε να επαναπροσδιορίσουμε τη λέξη Φιλότιμο μεταξύ μας και κατόπιν να την εισαγάγουμε στα διεθνή λεξικά μεταφρασμένη στα αγγλικά ως ‘Philotimo’.Γιατί χρίζει το ‘Φιλότιμο’ επαναπροσδιορισμού;Γιατί απλά όπως κάθε έννοια στο επίκεντρο της ζωής του Πολίτη, όπως η ελευθερία, η δημοκρατία, η δικαιοσύνη, και τα ανθρώπινα δικαιώματα μεταξύ άλλων, αναπόδραστα χρωματίζονται και επαξιώνονται (ή απαξιώνονται) μέσα στον ρου της εξέλιξης της σύγχρονης κοινωνίας και στους συσχετισμούς μεταξύ ατομικού και κοινωνικού συμφέροντος. Ξεκινώντας από το Φιλότιμο, τον ακρογωνιαίο λίθο του πολιτισμικού μας DNA, έχουμε καλύτερες πιθανότητες να καταλήξουμε σε κοινή συναίνεση δίχως την ανάγκη μεσαζόντων (ίσως εκτός μιας ανεξάρτητης επιστημονικής ομάδας). Η διαδικασία θα μας βοηθήσει να αναγνωρίσουμε την αξία της κοινής συναίνεσης ως πρωταρχικό συστατικό κοινωνικής συνοχής και εθνικής ταυτότητας, και των προκλήσεων αλλά και ευεργετημάτων που επιφυλάσσει ο διάλογος παρόμοιων διαδικασιών. Τέλος, η διαδικασία επαναπροσδιορισμού της έννοιας Φιλότιμο, ίσως μας βοηθήσει να προσπελάσουμε αναχρονιστικά εθνικά αφηγήματα που αναστέλλουν την συμβίωση και πρόοδο μας εντός μιας παγκόσμιας διεθνούς κοινότητας.Γιατί να το εισαγάγουμε στα διεθνή λεξικά; Γιατί είναι το απλούστερο συλλογικό εγχείρημα στο οποίο μπορούμε όλοι να συμβάλλουμε από όπου κι αν βρισκόμαστε, μέσα από τον υπολογιστή ή το κινητό μας. Γιατί αποτελεί παράλληλα διεκδίκηση θέσης αλλά και παραχώρηση χρήσης μια έννοιας με πανανθρώπινο νόημα. Για να ανατρέξει κανείς στην τελευταία φορά που Ελληνική λέξη εποίκησε ξένο λεξικό ή λεξιλόγιο θα πρέπει να γυρίσει πίσω αρκετούς αιώνες. Πίσω στον καιρό όπου ο Ελληνικός πολιτισμός εξάσκησε και τελειοποίησε μέσα από λέξεις-σύμβολα καινοτομίες όπως την φιλοσοφία, τη ρητορική, τη δημοκρατία, τον Ολυμπισμό. Όλοι θυμόμαστε την «Αθήνα» που κατέκτησε την κατακτήτρια «Ρώμη» με τη γλώσσα και τις τέχνες της. Γιατί τέλος, η παγκόσμια κοινότητα είναι έτοιμη να δεχτεί την καινοτομία στο επίπεδο συσχετισμών Πολίτη-Συμπολίτη και Πολιτείας-Πολιτών όσο ποτέ άλλοτε στη σύγχρονη ιστορία της. Και γιατί ίσως η ιδέα Φιλότιμο, πρώτα ζυμωμένη μεταξύ Ελλήνων, αποτελέσει φάρο νοήματος και για τους «έξω». Η ΠρωτοβουλίαΗ Πρωτοβουλία #Philotimo ξεκίνησε από το Λονδίνο το 2011, με τη συνειδητοποίηση του ερευνητικού κενού στη σύγχρονη διεθνή βιβλιογραφία γύρω από την σύνθετη έννοια της λέξης Φιλότιμο την κεντρικότερη αξία της Ελληνικής πολιτισμικής ταυτότητας. Η ιδέα του να αναζητηθεί το «χαμένο φιλότιμο» όπως συχνά αναφέρεται, ξεκίνησε ένα συναρπαστικό ταξίδι με απίθανες συμπτώσεις και εποικοδομητικές συναντήσεις που οδήγησαν στην δημιουργία της μη-κερδοσκοπικής startup πλατφόρμας σκέψης/δράσης «Φιλότιμο Ίδρυμα» τον Σεπτέμβριο του 2014.Αποτελούμαστε από μια διεθνή ομάδα φίλων, εξειδικευμένων σε πεδία μεταξύ άλλων της ψυχολογίας και των κοινωνικών επιστημών, του μάρκετινγκ, της ιατρικής, της στατιστικής επιστήμης και της επιστήμης υπολογιστών, όπου ένωσε γύρω από αυτό τον σκοπό τις ιδέες, τις δυνάμεις και τις οικονομίες της. Ξεκινήσαμε τη συλλογή δεδομένων γύρω από ορισμούς και ιστορίες για το Φιλότιμο μέσα από τη διεθνή κοινότητα Ελλήνων. Σύντομα διαπιστώσαμε την κεντρικότητα της έννοιας στην κοινωνική συνοχή και την αγωγή του πολίτη εντός Ελλάδας αλλά και διεθνώς. Η Αποστολή Το Φιλότιμο είναι μια λέξη που δεν μπορεί να αναπαραχθεί από το «σύστημα». Επάνω στην οποία όμως αυτό βασίζεται στις κρισιμότερες ώρες για να επιβιώσει και να ανανεωθεί.Πιστεύουμε ότι το κλίμα σήμερα στην Ελλάδα και τον κόσμο ευνοεί για να ξεκινήσει ένας διάλογος γύρω από το τι είναι καλό και ωφέλιμο για την κοινωνία και την ανθρωπότητα, και τί όχι. Είναι ίσως η κρισιμότερη στιγμή για να εισαγάγουμε τη λέξη #PHILOTIMO στον κόσμο ως το αντίδοτο απέναντι σε λέξεις όπως την Μετά-Αλήθεια, την Ξενοφοβία και την ιδέα ενός Σουρεαλιστικού κόσμου (έννοιες που διακρίθηκαν στα διεθνή λεξικά το 2016).Αποστολή μας να κάνουμε το πρώτο βήμα ανάδειξης της λέξης παγκοσμίως με την εισαγωγή της στα διεθνή λεξικά (ενδεχομένως ακριβώς κάτω από τη λέξη ‘Φιλοσοφία’), παρακινώντας ένα διεθνές κίνημα ανάδειξής της ως μία από τις νέες λέξεις του 2017!Επιπλέον σκοπός μας η προεργασία διεθνούς Ντοκιμαντέρ γύρω από την ιστορία, τη θεωρία, την επιστήμη και το κοινωνικό κεφάλαιο του ‘Φιλότιμου’ με τη συνδρομή της πολυαγαπημένης εταιρείας παραγωγών “Indigo View" («Το Νησί», «Η Λέξη Που Δε Λες»). Τέλος, αποσκοπούμε στην ανάπτυξη τεκμηριωμένων εφαρμογών διερεύνησης και καλλιέργειας της έννοιας και πρακτικής του φιλότιμου μέσα σε περιβάλλοντα όπως τον εκπαιδευτικό και εργασιακό τομέα, και τις σχέσεις πολιτείας-πολίτη. Πώς μπορείτε να βοηθήσετε Έως και τις 27 Ιανουαρίου 2017 μπορείτε να μας ενισχύσετε με ένα ποσό, μικρό όσο 2 ευρώ (περίπου $3) ή ανάλογο των δυνατοτήτων σας, μέσα από την πλατφόρμα συμμετοχικής χρηματοδότησης IndieGoGo (https://igg.me/at/philotimo). Από την πλευρά μας δεσμευόμαστε ότι θα γνωρίζετε ανά πάσα στιγμή που πήγε μέχρι και το τελευταίο ευρώ. Ως επιβράβευση των συνδρομών προσφέρουμε δώρα όπως ένα Μεγάλο Ευχαριστώ στα κοινωνικά μας δίκτυα, την ονομαστική αναφορά συνδρομητών στο Ντοκιμαντέρ ‘Φιλότιμο’, μπλουζάκια της καμπάνιας #PHILOTIMO, συμμετοχή στο καλοκαιρινό καταφύγιο ‘Philotimo Retreat’ και στο επιμορφωτικό εταιρικό σεμινάριο Phi.Lo.Ti.Mo. διαμορφωμένο από τους ειδικούς της ομάδας μας.Αν δεν έχετε τη δυνατότητα να μας στηρίξετε οικονομικά, σας ζητάμε να χρησιμοποιήσετε την ετικέτα #PHILOTIMO στα κοινωνικά σας δίκτυα όσο συχνότερα μπορείτε για να μοιραστείτε σκέψεις, συναισθήματα και ιστορίες γύρω από το Φιλότιμο, και έτσι να γίνετε συνοδοιπόροι στην εκστρατεία διάδοσης της λέξης.Κάθε μορφή βοήθειας από τις παραπάνω είναι εξίσου σημαντική και πολύτιμη.Υπεράνω όλων, θα λάβετε την προσωπική ικανοποίηση και την αναγνώριση από όλους εμάς για τη συμμετοχή σας σε αυτό το μοναδικό διεθνές κίνημα για να αλλάξουμε λίγο τον κόσμο, μια φιλότιμη χειρονομία τη φορά.Ας κάνουμε μαζί το #PHILOTIMO τη λέξη που πρέπει να λες, τη λέξη που όλος ο κόσμος θα πρέπει να λέει!Μόνο μαζί μπορούμε.Φιλότιμο Ίδρυμαwww.philotimo.orgwww.facebook.com/philotimon-------------------------------------------------------THE STORYThe Philotimo Initiative began in London in 2011, following the realization of a research gap within international bibliography around the complex concept of “philotimo”- a concept central to Greek cultural identity. The more data we gathered, the more certain we became of #PHILOTIMO’s centrality in what constitutes 'social glue' and good citizenship today. THE MISSION Philotimo is a word that can’t be reproduced by the “system” , upon which the system however relies in its darkest hour to be revived and renewed.We believe that there couldn’t be better timing for the need to engage in an open dialogue around what constitutes good and what not for society. No better timing to introduce a word like #PHILOTIMO to the world as the antidote to words such as Post-Truth, Xenophobia and the sense of living in a Surreal world!With your support we will be able to take the first steps in gaining momentum for Philotimo and petition its entry across international dictionaries, possibly right under the word ‘Philosophy’,  and spread its meaning globally hoping to create a world trend by the end of 2017.Furthermore, you will be helping us initiate the production of a Feature Documentary on the history, theory, science and social capital of philotimo, featuring expert personalities across cultures and disciplines. A partner in this will be the highly acclaimed production team of “Indigo View" ! What We Need & What You GetWe ask you to contribute as much as you can afford starting from $3 (~ €2), and we promise you will know how we've spent your money right to the last penny! If you are unable to support us financially, we ask that you use the hashtag #PHILOTIMO to share thoughts, feelings and stories (or our campaign page) about philotimo across your social networks. This is equally valuable and important!!In exchange you will receive gifts such as a Big Thank You note, credits in the Philotimo Documentary, exclusive Philotimo T-Shirts, participation in our Philotimo Retreats this summer in Greece, or the Corporate Phi.Lo.Ti.Mo training for your company if so you choose. Most importantly you will receive the satisfaction and our recognition for taking part in a unique international movement to change the world, one philotimous gesture at a time! Spread the word #PHILOTIMO and join us on the journey!

story:
JP Green School teaches children and teens to learn and live sustainably. We host classes for homeschoolers, after-school programs, and summer camps.

We focus extensively, but not exclusively, on teaching the mindset of sustainability through urban gardening (permaculture), cooking, and green building. We explore all related concepts, practices and skills, and integrate them with the relevant science.

We study environmental problems and their potential resolutions. We teach basic biology, physics and chemistry, with all the lessons evolving from hands-on experience in nature. One of our major goals is to make sure students attain a foundational knowledge of evolution and natural selection.

In our philosophy of “unschooling” the main priority is to create a safe, warm and joyful space for young people. Our teaching style is based on natural interactions with place, people, plants and animals. We deliberate counteract the dominant paradigm of learning through formal instruction, indoors. We work mostly outdoors, with our bodies in nature. Everything we do proceeds from the belief that learning is a fully natural capacity, and a joyful one.

Our main “classroom” is JP Green House, a zero-carbon homestead in  Jamaica Plain (JPGH.org). We have an indoor space for discussions, art, games, and cooking, and a large garden for putting lessons into practice.

A day is comprised of work and experiential workshops, and includes work, play, art, and self-directed learning.

Our Funding Needs: Create an Outdoor Classroom

We teach about 75 kids/year in classes of 8 children. Our outdoor space is 3000 square feet of growing space, and a big patio that serves as a ball court, a giant chalkboard, a scooter-run, a water park and more. We want to enhance it with natural-building projects, placemaking signs, a chicken coop, rainwater irrigation, and a teen assistant to teach and learn beside us!

Our Outdoor Classroom needs:

Design, materials, and coaching to build a solar-powered rain-barrel irrigation system $700

Funding for a local teen teaching assistant for one year $3000

Microscopes, shelving, and kid-sized furniture that we can use both indoors and outdoors $400

Materials and labor to repair an existing chicken coop and get it up and running $400

Repairs to two existing stone staircases leading to the garden (for safety)  $2000

Natural stone to build a stone wall, and to fund a workshop instructor to teach us how! $900

Materials and instruction to help us build a grape arbor for a 100-year-old Concord Grape Vine $400

Professional signs to label parts of our school-infrastructure (e.g. rain barrels for water conservation; the worm compost bins; the chicken coop, the green design features of the house, etc.) $500

story:
Short Summary

MOXchange is a web-based trading platform for MTGO players that makes true peer to peer trading possible, with prices going down to 0.002 tickets. MOXchange displays only the best buy and sell offer for any given item, so there is no need to compare prices in the classifieds. You get the best deal every time, guaranteed. Transaction fees are 0.5% ($1 in fees for every $200 in trades), making it the best trading platform whether you consider yourself a casual player, grinder, speculator, or someone interested in running a bot operation. MOXchange is live and running, but we need your help to take it to the next level. 

https://moxchange.com/

https://www.facebook.com/magiconlineexchange

https://www.reddit.com/r/MOXchange/


The Impact

For the longest time, bots have dominated the MTGO trading landscape.  There are a handful of bot owners who maintain a list of buy and sell offers for many of the cards on MTGO.  Trading and liquidity has improved since bots entered the marketplace, but the average player was left at a distinct disadvantage.

  • Humans can't buy or sell anything for denominations other than whole event tickets
  • Humans can't complete a trade unless they are physically at their computer.
Human traders should not automatically be at a disadvantage in the marketplace due to the lack of a micro-currency. The MTGO market is far more efficient than paper magic, but it could do far better if there were more participants. Bringing human participants back into trading on an equal level narrows the buy and sell margins for everyone. MOXchange is here to level the playing field. 
For those focused on playing, the days of wasting time comparing prices, and getting anything less than top dollar for your cards are finally over. With MOXchange, anyone can place a buy or sell offer on anything they'd like, from anywhere they'd like. People who'd like to do so can place buy/sell offers on any card or booster and then wait for someone to accept the offer. For someone who doesn't have the time to set an offer, they can always choose to accept the existing best price that the market has to offer. As more people transition from the old bot paradigm to the MOXchange market, price margins will shrink as competition in the market grows. In the end, we want you to get the most out of each dollar you spend on MTGO. For those that want to go infinite, or even run a profitable business on MTGO, we will provide you with the best platform to do so. If you were thinking of going through the complexities of renting a bot and operating it, we are your solution. 


What We Need & What You Get

By moving trading from the MTGO game client to the web, MOXchange has been able to solve all of the major problems that have plagued MTGO players for years. MOXchange bots let players deposit and withdraw cards and tickets between their MTGO and MOXchange accounts quickly and efficiently.  From the website, players can set buy and sell offers all the way down to 0.002 tickets on any items they'd like, or they can choose to accept the offers that others have posted.  Since MOXchange gathers all of the buy and sell offers in one centralized place, we're able to sort them and display only the very best price in our network at any time. 

MOXchange is looking for $20,000 to pay for the continued development of our trading platform.  It has taken a long time and a lot of money to get to where we're at, and we are at the point where we require financial assistance to complete some outstanding features and make MOXchange everything we know it can be.  We want to make sure that the people who believe in this project and help us out in this early stage receive at least a greatly improved trading experience. If we can collect $20,000, we promise to complete the development of: 

Single-Click Set Completion:
Redeeming complete sets on MTGO can often be a great deal in theory, but in practice, finding all the cards at a reasonable price can be prohibitively time consuming.  MOXchange wants to reduce the time it takes to complete a set down to that of a single click, while allowing you to buy with the confidence of knowing that MOXchange always matches you with the very best offer.

Collection Estimate:
Want to appraise your collection? Simply click a button and MOXchange will calculate what you can get right now if you were to sell your items individually at the best price offered. Collection estimates will be offered at 0.25 tickets per estimate. 

Mobile:
In on the hot tech at the GP tournament floor? MOXchange allows you to complete trades right from your smartphone.  We believe that instantaneous trading on mobile devices is the way of the future, and we  want to optimize the mobile version of MOXchange to ensure that you have the best experience possible. 

Updated Price-lists: 

New bot operators often quickly find that managing a collection and keeping up with the market is not as it seemed at first. The MTGO market can be quite volatile, and events like card bannings and pros unveiling new tech often shake things up and cause card prices to rise and fall very quickly. Keeping on top of your offers can become a challenge with even a medium-sized inventory.  With a large inventory, you need algorithms that modify your bids appropriately.  MOXchange plans to offer competitive price lists to our users for 0.25 per download, as well as customizable automated pricing options. With our regularly updated price-lists and customizable price controls, you can easily have an efficient store set-up in a centralized exchange platform; no technical skills required. API scripts to fully control your pricing strategies for the serious operator will be next up after the price-lists.

Store Bots:

The most exciting coming development is that of Store bots. MOXchange store bots will allow full, seamless integration between the MOXchange website and MTGO.  MOXchange store bots will act just like the traditional bots we've seen on MTGO for a long time, allowing non-registered users to accept buy and sell offers directly from the game client. When you set the most competitive buy and sell bids, our bots will be listing your price and your items and making the transactions for you. 

Risks & Challenges

The development goals listed above are ambitious. Software development can be unpredictable, and several factors, some of them uncontrollable, can lead to unexpected delays. While we will certainly do our absolute best to deliver features at their scheduled times, it's important to note that these are estimates and not promises. 

Another thing worth nothing is that prepaid transaction fees (armor) are currently in the process of being developed. Although armor will be delivered as soon as possible, it will not be immediately available for use. We expect aror to be developed and delivered by February, 2016. 

Finally, although we are making efforts to place competitive offers on as many cards as we can, MOXchange is really an exchange platform for the community. The more users we have on MOXchange, the more competitive the prices will be. 

Other Ways You Can Help

MOXchange is a community trading platform at heart. The quality of MOXchange prices depend heavily on the number of bids and users on the platform. The best way that you can help us is to register, put up some bids, and help spread the word and bring more users to our platform. 

  • Check out MOXchange, and see what it's all about! Put up some bids! Every bid and every user makes the MTGO marketplace that much better for everyone.
  • Help spread the word about the project to your MTGO playing friends.
  • Join the MOXchange community on reddit, Facebook, twitter, and YouTube. 
  • Give us your feedback! MOXchange is for the players, so take part and tell us what you want.
story_txt:
Short Summary 
MOXchange is a web-based trading platform for MTGO players that makes true peer to peer trading possible, with prices going down to 0.002 tickets. MOXchange displays only the best buy and sell offer for any given item, so there is no need to compare prices in the classifieds. You get the best deal every time, guaranteed. Transaction fees are 0.5% ($1 in fees for every $200 in trades), making it the best trading platform whether you consider yourself a casual player, grinder, speculator, or someone interested in running a bot operation. MOXchange is live and running, but we need your help to take it to the next level. 
https://moxchange.com/
https://www.facebook.com/magiconlineexchange 
https://www.reddit.com/r/MOXchange/


The ImpactFor the longest time, bots have dominated the MTGO trading landscape.  There are a handful of bot owners who maintain a list of buy and sell offers for many of the cards on MTGO.  Trading and liquidity has improved since bots entered the marketplace, but the average player was left at a distinct disadvantage.

Humans can't buy or sell anything for denominations other than whole event tickets
Humans can't complete a trade unless they are physically at their computer.

Human traders should not automatically be at a disadvantage in the marketplace due to the lack of a micro-currency. The MTGO market is far more efficient than paper magic, but it could do far better if there were more participants. Bringing human participants back into trading on an equal level narrows the buy and sell margins for everyone. MOXchange is here to level the playing field. 

For those focused on playing, the days of wasting time comparing prices, and getting anything less than top dollar for your cards are finally over. With MOXchange, anyone can place a buy or sell offer on anything they'd like, from anywhere they'd like. People who'd like to do so can place buy/sell offers on any card or booster and then wait for someone to accept the offer. For someone who doesn't have the time to set an offer, they can always choose to accept the existing best price that the market has to offer. As more people transition from the old bot paradigm to the MOXchange market, price margins will shrink as competition in the market grows. In the end, we want you to get the most out of each dollar you spend on MTGO. For those that want to go infinite, or even run a profitable business on MTGO, we will provide you with the best platform to do so. If you were thinking of going through the complexities of renting a bot and operating it, we are your solution. 







  
What We Need & What You Get
 
By moving trading from the MTGO game client to the web, MOXchange has been able to solve all of the major problems that have plagued MTGO players for years. MOXchange bots let players deposit and withdraw cards and tickets between their MTGO and MOXchange accounts quickly and efficiently.  From the website, players can set buy and sell offers all the way down to 0.002 tickets on any items they'd like, or they can choose to accept the offers that others have posted.  Since MOXchange gathers all of the buy and sell offers in one centralized place, we're able to sort them and display only the very best price in our network at any time. 
MOXchange is looking for $20,000 to pay for the continued development of our trading platform.  It has taken a long time and a lot of money to get to where we're at, and we are at the point where we require financial assistance to complete some outstanding features and make MOXchange everything we know it can be.  We want to make sure that the people who believe in this project and help us out in this early stage receive at least a greatly improved trading experience.
